author: nao
post_text: February 18, 2015 at 2:53 PM#1Hi,I've tried to make an macro that changes PT presets to XYZ presets, and at the same time doesn't kill the preset link where it's used.Is there a way to do this?At first I made a macro that just converts the PT value to XYZ and overwrites the old preset. But then the preset links in the cues get broken.I've also tried with the replace command. But it's still  not working.I've guess its the same problem from Color1 to CMY.Any clever thoughts?-naoFilesPreset PT to XYZ.xml3.38 kB – 63 Downloads
